item.title: Exploring Astrophysics and Gravitational Lensing with the Lemur Pro
item.description: Interview with Massimo Pascale, an astrophysicist armed with the System76 Lemur Pro. Discover how gravitational lensing, the Sunburst Arc, and open-source tech converge to unravel the universe's mysteries.
item.content:encoded: Interview with Massimo Pascale, an astrophysicist armed with the System76 Lemur Pro.
